item.title: Bulletin updated at 14:45 HKT 07/06/2016
item.author: Hong Kong Observatory
item.description:
A trough of low pressure is lingering over the coast of Guangdong and the northern part of the South China Sea. Locally, showers after midday brought more than 20 millimetres of rainfall to Sha Tin, Ma On Shan and Yuen Long.

Weather forecast for this afternoon and tonight:
Mainly cloudy with isolated heavy showers and squally thunderstorms. Light winds.

Outlook: Remaining unsettled with thundery showers in the next few days.
